titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3073) to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide for grants for projects designed to promote responsible fatherhood, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-463, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3073 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 156.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 367.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 278 - 144 (Roll no. 582).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/8/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3073 (grants for projects designed to promote responsible fatherhood).
